channel.title: More emote/teletabs?
channel.description:
i noticed this on most the servers that have emote or tele tabs. A lot of sources stop after 10 tabs.
Why?
All you have to do is get the action button and use that number as a case below case 185.
Idk, maybe ill make a tut or something. And related to this topic, I sort of need some opinions.
What do you think is better, emotes for the tabs, or teletabs.? I can't decide what to use them for on my latest project.

item.title: More emote/teletabs?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:4, topic:232112"]Anything which has teleports on the emote tab is retarded.[/quote]which is why i asked for opinions. People seem to think otherwise, I just want to see something that would make me choose one or the other.

The only reason i see the need for teletabs is for convenience. Other than that, after coding some older sources, i began to notice how much more clean it would be with emotes in the “emote” section ;]

Read full topic
